# SpunkArt -- Original Abstract Paintings

> SpunkArt is an abstract art studio creating original paintings in acrylic, mixed media, and spray paint. Bold colors, raw expression, one-of-a-kind originals. Commissions and prints available. Follow @SpunkArt13.

## About

SpunkArt creates original abstract paintings characterized by bold color, raw expression, and layered mixed media techniques. Every piece is a one-of-a-kind original -- no prints-only work, no reproductions passed off as originals. The studio works primarily in acrylics, spray paint, ink, and textured mixed media on canvas.

## What We Offer

### Original Paintings
One-of-a-kind abstract paintings on canvas. Each piece is signed, photographed, and ships ready to hang. Styles range from explosive color fields to textured minimalism.

### Art Prints
High-quality gicl√©e prints of select original works. Archival inks on premium paper. Available in multiple sizes.

### Custom Commissions
Commission a custom abstract painting tailored to your space, color palette, and vision. Commissions start at $500. The process includes a consultation, concept sketches, progress updates, and a finished original shipped to your door.

## Collections
- The Damned
- Crazy Aliens
- Dreamers
- The Freak Show
- Faces
